title: Hour 2: Mike Drop
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Michael Irvin, and Dan Orlovsky debate where the Cowboys stand in the NFC in a heated debate. Marcus Spears joins the show with his reaction to an incident of racism against a Duke Volleyball player during a match at BYU. Mike Tomlin has never had a losing season... yet. Someone here thinks that streak will end this season. The crew gives us their top Super Bowl sleeper teams.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Will the Steelers have their 1st losing season under Mike Tomlin?
